EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_UK_Office_Opening_Q114.Confirmation - VIP
EmailTemplate.subject: RSVP Confirmation Pivotal UK Office Opening
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Thanks}},
Thank-you for RSVP'ing to the Pivotal UK Office Opening Party. Details can be found below, we hope to see you there:
Date: Wednesday, March 5th, 2014
What: VIP Reception at Pivotal Office Time: 5:00pm - 6:00pm Location: Pivotal UK Address: 168-172 Old Street, EC1V 9BP
followed by:
What: Launch Party at McQueen Time: 6:30pm - 9:30pm Location: McQueen <http://www.mcqueen-shoreditch.co.uk/> Address: 55-61 Tabernacle Street, EC2A 4AA
Please email us at ateslia@gopivotal.com <mailto:ateslia@gopivotal.com> if you have any questions.
